abstract: Peter Morris, a baseball historian, tried pin down the origin of telephones to call the bullpen in his 2006 book, "A Game of Inches: The Stories Behind the Innovations That Shaped Baseball."
snippet: Peter Morris, a baseball historian, tried pin down the origin of telephones to call the bullpen in his 2006 book, "A Game of Inches: The Stories Behind the Innovations That Shaped Baseball."

headline.main: Tracing Debut of the Telephone in Dugouts and Bullpens
